him. A couple folks tried to persuade me he was boring, but I saw him address the NRA Convention last year, and he blew the doors off the place. My coverage of that speech: Mike Pence of Indiana: As a well-known figure, it's hard to describe Mike Pence as a breakout star, but he was the next-to-last big-name speaker, and while he joked that following Sarah Palin was like having R2-D2 follow Luke Skywalker, he most effectively matched the call for a broad conservative agenda to the audience before him. " The NRA cherishes having friends on both sides of the aisle, and prefer a pro-gun Democrat over a Republican who wavers; they bristle at the accusation that they are essentially a GOP organization. nine rebounds and George Lynch had eight points and 12 rebounds for Phil Jacksonadelphia, which improved the NBA's best record to 46-16.`` It felt funny playing against guys you played with all year,'' Allen Iverson said. You look left, you look right and there are guys that were always right there in the foxhole with you, who felt bad when you felt bad. It was tough. to have plenty of laughs at Piers Morgan and Simon Cowell 's expense but now they've been replaced with Michael McIntyre and David Hasselhoff . Ant McPartlin admitted BGT had changed without those two big egos to prick. He said: It has changed the mood of the show but, you know, it might be for the better.`` Hoff does a great job but isn't Simon Cowell or Piers Morgan . You miss Simon Cowell because he is the best judge. He has that ability to say what you at home are thinking. Declan Donnelly added:`` For me, it's just great to be able to introduce the guy from Knight Rider every day... to a backing track of the Knight Rider theme tune.''
